ingredients.content: 4 oz ripe pear, cut into pieces (approx. 1 pear)
3 ½ oz apple, cut into pieces  (approx. 1 apple)
10 ½ oz freshly squeezed orange juice

preparations.content: Place pear, apple, spinach leaves, water, orange juice and ice cubes into mixing bowl and blend <b>1 min 30 sec/speed 10<b>. Serve immediately.
